#This tutorial shows how to install KOALA in an AppScale PaaS that runs inside EC2

[KOALA http://koalacloud.appspot.com] can run inside a Private Cloud PaaS with [AppScale http://appscale.cs.ucsb.edu]. AppScale itself can be run inside EC2, Eucalyptus or just on top of Xen. 

This tutorial shows how to start AppScale 1.3 inside EC2 and upload KOALA into the AppScale PaaS.
